channel.title: Site-Specific on Luke Jaeger
channel.description: Recent content in Site-Specific on Luke Jaeger

item.title: If | Then | Else
item.description: I was plein air painting and had a bunch of paint left on the palette. Did you expect me to just throw it away?

item.title: Recursive Pipe Painting 1
item.description: Started making paintings on paper of these giant pipes waiting to be buried. It wasn’t that interesting, but then I thought of making paintings of the pipes on the pipes. No audience except maybe a few construction workers, and whoever digs up the pipes in some future century.

item.title: Recursive Pipe Painting 2
item.description: Started making paintings on paper of these giant pipes waiting to be buried. It wasn’t that interesting, but then I thought of making paintings of the pipes on the pipes. No audience except maybe a few construction workers, and whoever digs up the pipes in some future century.
